channel.title: Is my whonix download legit ?
channel.description:
I got whonix from their official website a year back and, my download seemed legit with the mouse photo and whonix logo, it looked exactly like the photos on whonix website. But due to some issues i had to erase everything on my machine and download others programs along with whonix again, however now i do not see the mouse photo in the center of the screen. I also noticed that the terminal along with other controls have been shifted at the top of the screen.
I also did a shasum 512 check for the download (Virtual box 256 shasum check) which assured me that it is legit but GNUPG check did not go through as on my host terminal i received an error that said "file or directory not found"
I also am not able to set disk to read only because the terminal comes back with an error message, so is something seriously wrong with this new download ?

item.title: Is my whonix download legit ?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
elves:

my download seemed legit with the mouse photo and whonix logo, it looked exactly like the photos on whonix website

That is a totally broken, insecure method of establishing authenticity. Visual styles can change over time and are trivially replicated by anyone. Even more trivially so since copy/paste. Let alone being Open Source. See also:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Malware#Indicators_of_Compromise

For proper authentication check, see:

Whonix – 31 Jan 21

Verifying Software Signatures - Whonix

Digital signatures can increase security but this requires knowledge. Learn more about Verifying Software Signatures, What Digital Signatures (Not) Prove, Verification Security Levels, Conceptual Challenges, Attacks in the Wild.

Whonix – 8 Dec 20

Verify Whonix ™ Images Software Signatures

Download image verification instructions for Non-Qubes-Whonix with OpenPGP and Signify

elves:

GNUPG check did not go through as on my host terminal i received an error that said “file or directory not found”

I recommend to learn basics of Linux, folder locations, gnupg… This is unspecific to Whonix. Make use of https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle.

elves:

GNUPG check did not go through as on my host terminal i received an error that said “file or directory not found”

Do not continue if verification fails! This risks using infected or erroneous files! The whole point of verification is to confirm file integrity. This page is strongly related to the pages Placing Trust in Whonix ™ and Verifying Software Signatures.

elves:

I also am not able to set disk to read only because the terminal comes back with an error message, so is something seriously wrong with this new download ?

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Malware#Indicators_of_Compromise

For that one, please try https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Please_Use_Search_Engines_And_See_Documentation_First and then post the error message in an existing (if seems related) or new forum thread if needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Is my whonix download legit ?

item.description:
I got whonix from their official website a year back and, my download seemed legit with the mouse photo and whonix logo, it looked exactly like the photos on whonix website. But due to some issues i had to erase everything on my machine and download others programs along with whonix again, however now i do not see the mouse photo in the center of the screen. I also noticed that the terminal along with other controls have been shifted at the top of the screen.

I also did a shasum 512 check for the download (Virtual box 256 shasum check) which assured me that it is legit but GNUPG check did not go through as on my host terminal i received an error that said “file or directory not found”

I also am not able to set disk to read only because the terminal comes back with an error message, so is something seriously wrong with this new download ?
